    Controller for the EmployeeInformation PopOver The user can see the information of an employee
    FilterEmployeesController
    Controller for the FilterEmployee PopOver The user can filter the employees by their qualifications

    Extends the GridPane class to create a custom GridPaneTable.

    Utility class for image-related operations in the application.

    Controller for managing the Information Window in the application.
    LegendWindowController
    Controller for the Legend.fxml file.
    LoadingScreen
    Class responsible for creating and managing a loading screen.
    PDFExportController
    This class is the windowcontrollers for the PDFExportWindow.fxml file.

    The SettingWindowController class is responsible for controlling the behavior of the setting window in the UI.

    Controller for the ShiftInfo PopOver
    ShiftTableWindowController
    Controller class for ShiftTableWindow.fxml This class is responsible for showing the ShiftTable.
    ShiftTypeVBox
    This class is responsible for creating the VBox for the Shift Here can the user add a shift or see the information of the shift
    StartWindowController
    Controller class for StartWindow.fxml This class is responsible for showing the start window (first window the user sees)
    WindowControllerUtils
    This class is used to show a PopOver window.
